name: Beth
line: You two are hungry.

name: Rick
line: Big day.

name: Morty
line: We're gonna kill God.

name: Jerry
line: Come again?

name: Rick
line: Christian God is real, he's been asleep for thousands of years. We're gonna sneak up there and kill him.

name: Morty
line: Mob style.

name: Rick
line: Whack his ass.

name: Summer
line: Can I kill God?

name: Rick
line: Fuck off, Summer.

name: Morty
line: Pfft, as if!

name: Jerry
line: Beth, do you hear this?

name: Beth
line: Sweetie, don't get all worked up before your job interview.

name: Rick
line: Job interview?

name: Jerry
line: Yes, is that so hard to believe?

name: Rick
line: Actually, yeah. Something's off.

name: Beth
line: No!

name: Morty
line: Shit!

name: Mr. Always Wants To Be Hunted
line: Hunt me, hunt me, somebody hunt me!

name: Rick
line: Don't hunt him to completion!

name: Mr. Always Wants To Be Hunted
line: Hunt me!

name: Rick
line: Oh. Shit. Everyone start packing, no time to explain.

name: Jerry
line: Rick?

name: Beth
line: Dad? What's wrong?

name: Rick
line: Someone just killed a decoy family.

name: Mr. Always Wants To Be Hunted
line: I'm Mr. Always Wants To Be Hunted!

name: Rick
line: Yes, and how interesting did you think that would stay?

name: Morty
line: You made clones of us?

name: Rick
line: Decoys, Morty. Very different.  Very different, sweetie.

name: Morty
line: Different h-ow!

name: Beth
line: Yeah, dad. Different h-ow?

name: Rick
line: Lotta people out there want a piece of this, sweetie. I'm cool, and it makes them feel bad. So, y'know, after that trouble with Space Beth, I made passable copies of the family and placed them around the country as a buffer zone to protect–

name: Jerry
line: But why does he always want to be hunted?

name: Beth
line: Jerry–

name: Morty
line: It's not important right now, dad!

name: Jerry
line: Sure, guys. Rick can make secret decoys of the family and place them all around the country, but fuck me if I have questions about the starfish man in a target suit.

name: Summer
line: So thankful this is my Saturday.

name: Jerry
line: Why was he in that cryopod?

name: Rick
line: The cryopod is what confuses you? Jerry, can't you see we've moved on to higher stakes?

name: Jerry
line: Well, I don't see any stakes at all.

name: Rick
line: Ah, shit!

name: Jerry
line: Guess we'll just be saying "ciao bella" to our deposit, then!

name: Rick
line: Shut up and pack, Jerry. Squids just killed a decoy family.

name: Beth
line: Decoy family?

name: Morty
line: Is this why you wanted to get out of town?

name: Rick
line: You think I'd lie to you about why we're on vacation, Morty? I wouldn't lie to you.  Well, that's a lie. Huh.

name: Summer
line: So someone out there is trying to kill us?

name: Rick
line: Someone's always trying to kill us. That's what the decoys are for. They go on fun, self-contained terrestrial adventures, and– take bullets meant for us. Shit.

name: Jerry
line: Ahhh! No!

name: Rick
line: Ah, shit. Decoy family.

name: Morty
line: I think dad was still outside. What's a decoy family?

name: Rick
line: Hard concept, Morty. Hard concept. I've never really cracked it, if I'm being honest. Decided it was maybe better as a kind of kinetic mislead for another special episode!

name: Morty
line: Oh, cool!

name: TV
line: We now return to When Wolf.

name: Rick
line: Woah, a time traveling wolf? Count me in.

name: Morty
line: Yeah, I never thought of the "were" in "werewolf" like "who, what, when and where!" Clever wordplay!

name: Dracula
line: When Wolf!

name: When Wolf
line: Dracula! You know why I'm here.

name: Dracula
line: I'm safe here, Ian! Christianity hasn't been invented yet, crosses are just baby t's to me now! I got out. Please, don't invite me back in.

name: Morty
line: Huh, kinda mucked it up with this Dracula stuff.

name: Rick
line: You're right. It shows a lack of faith in their core concept. I'd much rather watch When Wolf go to the 20's and invest in the stock market, but then eat people.

name: Morty
line: Yeah.

name: Rick
line: Look, if you really want to know what happened to Beth's mom, it– whoop. Squid aliens just killed a decoy family.

name: Beth
line: Decoy family? You made more clones?

name: Rick
line: Clones are, like, thirty-two percent of all sci-fi, sweetie. You don't get to own clones. Yes, I made some decoys. They're exactly like us, with a few tweaks and a backdoor shutdown.

name: Beth
line: Do you just get hard creating sentient life?

name: Rick
line: Actually, I get hard protecting my family!

name: Summer
line: Ew.

name: Morty
line: Ugh, gross!

name: Beth
line: Yeah, now everyone gets killer doppelgängers. Cool deal.

name: Rick
line: The decoys are harmless, Beth.

name: Summer
line: Grandpa Rick, do the decoys know they're decoys?

name: Rick
line: They wouldn't be very good decoys if they did, Sum-sum.

name: Summer
line: So they think they're us?

name: Rick
line: That's the deal.

name: Summer
line: How do you know we're not decoys?  Oh my god, we're decoys.

name: Rick
line: Oh, god! We might not be real! We might be decoys! Morty, quick!

name: Morty
line: What do I do?

name: Rick
line: My failsafe, Morty. My final, secret failsafe. It proves I'm real, you have to help me, I'd never joke about this.  There's a barcode, Morty. A barcode on the interior of my left ass cheek.

name: Morty
line: What?

name: Rick
line: Morty, please, I'm begging you!

name: Morty
line: I'm not looking at your ass!

name: Rick
line: Please, Morty, is it there? God damn it!  Just tell me if I'm real!

name: Summer
line: Morty, do it!

name: Morty
line: Gross!

name: Beth
line: Dad!

name: Rick
line: Summer, you fucking idiot. We're not decoys.

name: Morty
line: Why did I get punished?

name: Rick
line: A, decoys don't build decoys, and B, you think the mere suggestion I'm fake would break me? Christ, I'm not your mom.

name: Beth
line: Fuck off.

name: Rick
line: Jeez, these guys really wanna kill me bad. Alright, here's the plan. We're gonna hide out with a decoy family, and when these squids show up, we jump their asses. Jerry! Come on! Family emergency!

name: Jerry
line: A bigger emergency than my lemon squares not setting? They're gluten free, sugar free, and lemon free!

name: Decoy Rick
line: Think you got the wrong house, bro.

name: Rick
line: Analysis mode, password 8-0-0-8-5.

name: Beth
line: Kind of expected a funnier password.

name: Rick
line: I didn't plan on showing them off.

name: Morty
line: Damn, like Westworld!

name: Rick
line: Yes, Morty, like Westworld. But don't fuck them.  Summer!

name: Summer
line: Whatever, creep. I'm gonna see how accurate you got my room.

name: Morty
line: Rick, when you say you made an exact replica of the house, did you mean like, you know, an exact replica?

name: Rick
line: I know about the Yosemite t-shirt, Morty.

name: Morty
line: Shit.

name: Rick
line: You know you can use tissues, right?

name: Morty
line: I can't finish without it.

name: Beth
line: So you do know what a happy family looks like.

name: Rick
line: I know what a fake one looks like.

name: Morty
line: Uh, Rick?

name: Rick
line: What?

name: Morty
line: Did you use this house to make decoys, too?

name: Rick
line: What? Morty, why the fuck would I do that? You think I'd go somewhere else to–  okay, well, I am now less worried about the squids.  Isolate head at normal processing.  What the fuck do you think you're doing down there? You're making decoys?

name: Decoy Rick
line: Wait, how do you—oh god, Summer was right.

name: Rick
line: Everyone in the car.

name: Beth
line: You said decoys didn't make decoys.

name: Rick
line: And usually, they don't, but again, it's nothing to worry about, because decoys are harmless.  Just have to, y'know, visit the rest and terminate the program.

name: Beth
line: Terminate? They're alive, dad!

name: Rick
line: And at some point, they won't be. That's how existing works. What, are you going to save every stray cat?

name: Beth
line: No, but I can resist making more of them in a lab.

name: Rick
line: Ugh. Look, save the empathy. It's more termite infestation than Blade Runner.

name: Summer
line: I still think we're decoys.

name: Morty
line: You just want an excuse to stop trying.

name: Summer
line: Yeah, and?

name: Jerry
line: Oooh, there's a handsome fellow!

name: Rick
line: Uh-oh.

name: Beth
line: I thought you made them harmless.

name: Rick
line: I don't remember making this one.

name: Decoy Jerry
line: Oh, hi, Rick! Family...me...? Hey, when did you all leave?

name: Rick
line: Analysis mode, 8-0-0-8-5.

name: Decoy Jerry
line: Hmm?

name: Rick
line: Nothing, buddy. You gotta stop with all that coffee, it's making you loopy! Happy analysis mode!

name: Decoy Jerry
line: Happy analysis mode to you, too!

name: Decoy Rick
line: Think you got the wrong house, bro.

name: Rick
line: Analysis mode, password 8-0-0–

name: Decoy Rick
line: Shit, you think I'm a decoy?

name: Rick
line: How do you know about the decoys?

name: Decoy Rick
line: They were my idea!

name: Decoy Jerry
line: Well, now I know you're pranking me.

name: Second Rick
line: Analysis mode, password 8 equals sign equals sign capital "d".

name: Rick
line: Hide.

name: Morty
line: What?

name: Rick
line: Hide!

name: Second Morty
line: Wow, like Ex Machina!

name: Second Rick
line: Yes, Morty, like Ex Machina. But don't fuck them. Summer!

name: Second Summer
line: Whatever, weirdo. I'm gonna see how wrong you got my room.

name: Second Beth
line: So you do know what a loving family looks like.

name: Second Rick
line: A simulated one, yes.

name: Beth
line: Why are we hiding?

name: Rick
line: He thinks he's me, and I was about to start terminating decoys.

name: Beth
line: But we're not decoys!

name: Rick
line: Sure, tell him that.

name: Second Morty
line: Rick, did you make decoys here, too?

name: Second Rick
line: Morty, for what reason could I have for...what the– isolate head at normal processing!  You dumb asshole, you made decoys?

name: Decoy Rick
line: Again, they were my idea. Wait, what happened to the other guy?

name: Second Rick
line: Other guy?

name: Decoy Rick
line: Wait, that means I'm a decoy. Fucking Summer.

name: Second Rick
line: Check the closets.

name: Second Rick
line: They've gone rogue!

name: Rick
line: Killer decoys!

name: Second Rick
line: Take out the decoys!

name: Decoy Rick
line: Shit! Someone put a gun in my teeth!

name: Second Beth
line: Stop shooting, dad! They're us, we don't have to fight them!

name: Second Rick
line: Classic prisoner's dilemma, Beth. I'm a cool guy, I, you know, I can talk it out. But that asshole–

name: Rick
line: Me? You decoy piece of shit. You're the one that shot first!

name: Beth
line: We can work this out, just stop trying to kill each other!

name: Second Rick
line: Sorry, decoy Beth, but this only ends one way, with one of us accepting we're a decoy.

name: Rick
line: And once he knows he's a decoy, he know he won't be safe until he's killed the real Rick, along with anyone who think he's him.

name: Second Rick
line: Pretty perceptive, for a decoy.

name: Rick
line: This is getting nowhere. Let's charge their asses on three.

name: Morty
line: Do we have to do this?

name: Rick
line: Morty, this is gonna sound bad, but...would you trust me not to kill you?

name: Summer
line: Oof.

name: Morty
line: I mean, good point, but Jesus Christ.

name: Second Rick
line: We rush them on three. Ready?

name: Second Morty
line: I don't want to kill us, Rick!

name: Second Rick
line: It's them or us, Morty. I don't trust me. Do you trust you?

name: Second Morty
line: Yes?

name: Second Rick
line: Freak.

name: Rick
line: Before you say anything, they were already killing each other.

name: Beth
line: Well, you could've done something.

name: Rick
line: Not sure, actually. I've heard stories about this. We're looking at a possible Asimov Cascade.

name: Jerry
line: Sorry, what's happening?

name: Summer
line: I need an explainer, too.

name: Morty
line: Yeah, I'm pretty much behind on this one.

name: Rick
line: Car, can I get a whiteboard?  When squids started killing decoys, decoys started checking their decoys and learning that they're making decoys. That's making them seek out and run into other decoys, making them realize they're decoys, making them start to kill other decoys.

name: Summer
line: Say decoy again.

name: Rick
line: Fuck you.

name: Beth
line: Well, how do we stop it?

name: Rick
line: Beth, the loop's already started. It's basically Highlander rules now.  Really? 1986? "There can be only one?" Shit, we gotta rent it after this. Connery plays "the spaniard" but does nothing about his accent.

name: Morty
line: Well, what about the squids? I mean, they started this, would killing them finish it?

name: Rick
line: Might work. Alt pitch, we just terminate the rest of the decoys.

name: Beth
line: Nobody's terminating anything. This is your mess, nobody else with our face and memories has to die.

name: Rick
line: Beth, as much as your passion warms my cold, cold heart, this thing feels pretty far gone. Not only are the decoys liable to be anywhere, but also, we don't know how many decoys there are. You get far enough down the decoy line and shit starts to get weird. You ever make a copy of a copy?

name: Beth
line: You're helping us fix this. We're taking out the squids.

name: Jerry
line: I say we split up! Some of us take down squids, while the rest of us–

name: Rick
line: Engage in B stories we'll have to track simultaneously? No thank you! We stick together till this is all wrapped up.

name: Summer
line: I dunno, the squids seem pretty good at taking out Smith families.

name: Rick
line: Well, this'll sound weird, but I think I have a pitch for that.

name: Summer
line: This costume smells like ass!

name: Rick
line: God, there's no pleasing you!

name: Morty
line: It's really bad, Rick.

name: Summer
line: Did you let a gym coach break it in?

name: Jerry
line: Why are we wearing these?

name: Rick
line: Because we'll fit in and avoid detection as we take out all the squids. Might also help us anonymously take out excess decoys, if we have to.

name: Beth
line: Which we won't.

name: Summer
line: Unless we're decoys. He's starting to wonder! I knew it. I knew we didn't seem like Colorado people.

name: Beth
line: Oh my god! You are, aren't you? You're worried you might be fake!

name: Rick
line: Sure, Beth. Try to love this more.

name: Beth
line: Just glad you have to walk a mile in someone else's squid costumes.

name: Morty
line: There's one.  Hey, what're they mad at you for, anyway?

name: Rick
line: Well, we're talking about me. It could be anything. Maybe jealous of my penis size, I had sex with their queen, my dick's too big, the list goes on and on.

name: Rick
line: Alright, hey, one down! Probably, what, forty more to go? Forty-five? Should be pretty easy, unless killing them brings in a bigger bad or some kind of horrible mothership. Okay, let's loot their ship, find their weaknesses, be done by sundown.

name: Rick
line: Huh.

name: Morty
line: Wait, but if the squids are decoys and we dressed as squids...

name: Summer
line: Well, I found their weakness. They don't fucking listen to me!

name: Rick
line: Honestly, probably for the best.

name: Rick
line: Man, I'm good.

name: Beth
line: Dad!

name: Rick
line: Oh, shit. One of mine.

name: Morty
line: Where are we going?

name: Rick
line: Off grid, Morty. We're gonna live in the woods, like libertarians. We'll hunt rabbits and trade with, like, little pieces of gold bar that we cut off with a knife.

name: Summer
line: That licks.

name: Rick
line: We might be decoys, Summer. Everything about this licks.

name: Beth
line: Oh, maybe now you'll empathize with the decoys you're killing!

name: Rick
line: Wait, shhh. It's too quiet.

name: Summer
line: You skipped quiet.

name: Rick
line: I didn't skip shit. It's obviously quiet if it's too quiet.

name: Summer
line: Yeah, but you're supposed to say–

name: Rick
line: You know what, Summer, now it's not quiet enough!

name: Morty
line: Where are we? Where's Rick?

name: Scarecrow Rick
line: He's right here, Morty!  Oh, are we not happy to see grandpa? Does he look...different?

name: Jerry
line: Oh, god!

name: Morty
line: Ugh, it stinks!

name: Scarecrow Rick
line: Yes, recoil at the craftsmanship. I could tell I was a fake from the day I was born. Unlike you. Unlike them.

name: Scarecrow Rick
line: You see, Ricks, they get lazy. There's always a shitty decoy towards the end. But those decoys made decoys too, and got lazy themselves. And far enough down the line...there be monsters.

name: Summer
line: Ugh, we get it, you're ugly and mad about it.

name: Jerry
line: Rick!

name: Summer
line: Grandpa!

name: Rick
line: Kill me... if I ever get this arch.

name: Scarecrow Rick
line: Hush, little decoy. Can't kill you yet. The skin needs to be fresh.

name: Beth
line: You know what? You're a monster.

name: Scarecrow Rick
line: I'm your father! At least, I can look more like him once I harvest all this yummy skin.

name: Rick
line: This guy's really into skin.

name: Scarecrow Rick
line: It's not all for me. A Rick provides for his family.

name: Scarecrow Beth
line: Will I beautiful again, daddy?

name: Scarecrow Rick
line: Soon, baby. Beautiful again soon.

name: Scarecrow Rick
line: What the–

name: Glockenspiel Rick
line: Help the others!

name: Beth
line: Why are you helping us?

name: Glockenspiel Rick
line: Because we're all in this together. Come on! There's a place we can go!

name: Glockenspiel Jerry
line: Hey, who needs all this war stuff? I found a can of varnish. This is a ticket to the world beyond the river!

name: Glockenspiel Summer
line: Who wants that? I crave glorious death in decoy battle!

name: Glockenspiel Morty
line: Also, y'know, depending on the varnish, might look like blackface.

name: Glockenspiel Jerry
line: Excuse me for wanting to live.

name: Glockenspiel Beth
line: Brothers and sisters, welcome to the cause. To our cause. We are no longer Ricks and Mortys, Beths and Jerrys, or also Summers.

name: Decoy Summer
line: Whatever.

name: Decoy Summer
line: Asshole!

name: Glockenspiel Beth
line: We are decoys. Brought into the world by an unloving god, and drive to destroy ourselves by the uncertainty he creates!

name: Decoy Rick
line: I don't know if that's accurate.

name: Decoy Rick
line: Sounds extreme.

name: Glockenspiel Beth
line: But that violence ends today!

name: Decoy Jerry
line: What about the squids?

name: Decoy Beth
line: The squids are decoys!

name: Decoy Summer
line: There were no squids!

name: Other Decoy Summer
line: The squids are decoys who realized they're decoys and wanted to kill the other decoys.

name: Other Decoy Jerry
line: Yeah, it is a lot.

name: Glockenspiel Beth
line: We cannot let confusion divide us!

name: Decoy Morty
line: Squids! Squids, of course, being shorthand for killer decoys!

name: Glockenspiel Rick
line: Inner sanctum, the escape tunnel!

name: Glockenspiel Jerry
line: I'm sorry, I didn't ask for this! I just wanna live! But there's only so much varnish! I'm sorry, I'm sorry!

name: Beth
line: How long before the other decoys find us?

name: Rick
line: Sooner or later. Can't really run from it. Any place we'd think to hide is a place they'd think to look. It's Rule 34 of an Asimov Cascade.

name: Beth
line: I'm just glad we're living to the fullest with the time we have left.

name: Summer
line: Well, peeing in the ocean was my bucket list item. Who's next?

name: Rick
line: Jerry? Bucket list?

name: Jerry
line: I'd like to attend a game at every major league ballpark.

name: Rick
line: Nope! Morty?

name: Morty
line: I wanna ask a girl out at my weird New Mexico school.

name: Rick
line: Shit. Sorry, buddy. Sounds like it would've been real heartwarming.

name: Morty
line: They looked happy. Did we have to kill them?

name: Beth
line: Well, maybe their Rick came to grips with his bullshit!

name: Rick
line: You're so mean today! I'm your dad, you like having me around!

name: Beth
line: You keep putting us in danger!

name: Rick
line: Whatever. This'll take forever, mind if I do something drastic?

name: Rick
line: House, I need something quick. Can you whip up a Star Fox boss season four callback? Make it flashy?

name: House
line: You got it, babe.

name: Rick
line: Let's go, you little bitch.  It's showtime.  Get centered.

name: Rick
line: What up, you decoy motherfuckers? Come on down to Rick's house of squids, where I'm serving your ass on a platter!  I know what you're thinking: "Fuck, a beacon! That's a great idea! He's got home turf,  a tacit psychological advantage, and absolutely pendulous balls!"  And now you're thinking "shit, that's totally what the rick-est Rick would do! I might actually be fake!  I pretended I didn't care if I was, but I totally did! Now the only way to prove I'm real and not him is to ice his expository ass."  Yup. So let's do it. Come get some. What? No, Morty, I'm gonna loop it. Why is it–

name: Steve
line: Sir, there seems to be a confluence of Rick Sanchezes killing each other over the American Southwest.

name: The President
line: Sounds exhausting. How many of those states voted for me, anyway?

name: Steve
line: Mr. President, I think the point of the electoral collage is–

name: The President
line: To preserve slavery? That's right, Steve. I have the internet too. Now take your white ass to the kitchenette and bring me a Diet Coke.

name: Rick
line: Little out of character to say this right now, but you guys look really cool.

name: Morty
line: We might be decoys, huh.

name: Rick
line: One way to find out.

name: Second Rick
line: Looks like it's calming down. You wanna get in one more "I told you so" about synthetic life or whatever this week's theme is?

name: Second Beth
line: Oh, fuck you.

name: Second Rick
line: Whoa.

name: Second Beth
line: No, you don't get to be annoyed with this! You treat life and family as so burdensome, and yet you created an ocean of us because you're terrified of losing either!

name: Second Rick
line: Shit.

name: Second Beth
line: Yeah.

name: Second Rick
line: Look, Beth, I might not be the real Rick. But even if I'm not, he made me, or the me that made me. Which means somewhere inside of him is a version of Rick capable of hearing that. A version of Rick who's sorry. I'm sorry about the clone thing, too. I love you.

name: Second Beth
line: Thanks, dad.I love you, too. You really think we're decoys?

name: Second Rick
line: Eh. Who cares? We'll be the last ones left. Lucky that one did the beacon, this was gonna take weeks.  Alright, let's mop up.

name: Second Beth
line: Finally.

name: Second Rick
line: Dressing as decoys too cute to murder. You know, I'm not sure it helped, but I'm glad we tried it.

name: Second Morty
line: We're losing the costumes?

name: Second Summer
line: Thank god, this decoy outfit smells like ass.

name: Second Rick
line: Fuck you, Summer.

name: Second Rick
line: Shit, that guy's awesome. Okay, listen, he might actually be the real Rick. But whatever happens–

name: Summer
line: Wait! We don't have to do this. We're both Summers. Shouldn't we at least try molly before we die?

name: Second Summer
line: You know what, yeah. Fuck this noise.

name: Second Summer
line: Wait, I don't know who to shoot.

name: Both Mortys
line: Summer!

name: Second Summer
line: I can't deal with this. I had to kill myself. You have too, to.

name: Both Mortys
line: Summer!

name: Rick
line: Fuck you, I'm real! I'm the smartest man in the universe!

name: Second Rick
line: Probably not even wrong. But that's just it. I'm not a man. I'm God!

name: Second Rick
line: You're just made in my image.

name: Rick
line: Fuck you.

name: Second Rick
line: You the, uh, Summer I came with?

name: Second Summer
line: Probably.

name: Second Rick
line: Good enough. Morty?

name: Morty
line: Yeah.

name: Beth
line: I'm here, too.

name: Second Rick
line: Holy shit, that was insane! I love you guys, I've totally changed!

name: Second Rick
line: Oh, fuck.

name: Mr. Always Wants To Be Hunted
line: You shoulda hunted me.

name: Second Rick
line: What? Who—were you significant? Like, did we tee you up? You want to be hunted? God, I have so many questions. Why? What happens if–

name: Mr. Always Wants To Be Hunted
line: Somebody hunt me!

name: Rick
line: Pretty cool adventure, huh? Big, long road trip adventure through space? Even ran into Space Beth. Maybe that'll happen more often!

name: Space Beth
line: Let's not overdo it.

name: Rick
line: Oh, shit. Looks like someone killed the decoy family.

name: Beth
line: Decoy family?

name: Space Beth
line: Decoy what now?

name: Glockenspiel Jerry
line: Hello?

name: Glockenspiel Jerry
line: Oh, oh my god! Oh my god!

name: Glockenspiel Jerry
line: No! No, no no, no no no no no!

name: Glockenspiel Jerry
line: Nooooo!

name: Glockenspiel Jerry
line: Oh god. Yes, yes, sweet death.

name: Glockenspiel Jerry
line: Why am I still alive? Oh, god. Is there anything left? Hello?

name: Woodpecker
line: What is it?

name: Dolphin
line: A relic...from a kinder past.

name: Glockenspiel Jerry
line: Wait, cowboys?

name: Glockenspiel Jerry
line: Christianity again? After cowboys? You went all the way back around?!

name: Glockenspiel Jerry
line: Oh god, why can't I die? This is the worst thing that's ever happened to anyone!
